hero.title: HOOKS
hero.subtitle: Meet the Future of React
hero.description: Learn everything about React Hooks and experience the innovative features of React 19. An interactive learning guide with real-time demos.

guide.beginnerTitle: üéØ Complete React Hooks Guide for Beginners
guide.whatIsHookDesc: Hooks are functions that let you use React state and lifecycle features in functional components. You can use all React features without class components.
guide.whyUseHooksDesc: Hooks make it easy to reuse stateful logic between components and make complex components easier to understand.
guide.hookAdvantagesDesc: No 'this' binding issues from class components, and easier to test by splitting components into smaller functions.
guide.hookAdvantagesDesc.short: Easier to test by splitting components into smaller functions.
